## JamboConfig interface

Config that optionally contains paths to the various directories needed by Jambo.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface JamboConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [defaultTheme?](./jambo.jamboconfig.defaulttheme.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [dirs?](./jambo.jamboconfig.dirs.md) | { themes: string; config: string; output: string; pages: string; partials: string\[\]; preservedFiles?: string\[\]; translations?: string; } | <i>(Optional)</i> |
